text:
[Verse]
Lights shining so bright
In the middle of the night
Dreams take flight
Under stars tonight

[Verse 2]
City never sleeps
Secrets it keeps
Hearts take leaps
In the midnight streets

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
We reach up high
We'll touch and fly
Never say goodbye

[Verse 3]
Wind whispers low
Where the rivers flow
We let go
Time moves slow

[Bridge]
Feel the beat
Under our feet
Way down the street
Hearts skip a beat

[Chorus]
Stars in the sky
We reach up high
We'll touch and fly
Never say goodbye
title: Stars in the Sky
